divs: Sighting Detailsi was in a truck driving down highway 28 frim marquette towards the makinaw bridge with my friend Drew we were driving along and i looked at the clock. it said 11:40 then i sat back in my seat and something weird happend to me it was like a clip of my life had just been cut out. it was the wierdest feeling. i was inmy chair one second sitting back and then the next second i was leaning forward i looked at the clock and it said 11:52. the weird part was the same 3 min. song was still playing on the radio. before i could say anything my friend drew looks at me and asks me if i felt "that" that being that missing peice of time that we had both just experienced
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Marquette
There were no other sightings in Marquette on or around March 31st 2006
